description: Plan each route carefully in this 2D platformer, because you won't have much time to do so once you've started! Although, an equally valid strategy is to simply go for it; don't you just love having infinite lives?
name: Vylan
intro: Vylan is a 100 level platformer with the most unique movement ever! In Vylan you have to beat each level within the time limit to proceed. Can you do it?
